      • response

        @POST
@Path(value="/response")
@Produces(value="text/plain")
public java.lang.String response(@FormParam(value="uname")
                                           java.lang.String uname,
                                           @FormParam(value="email")
                                           java.lang.String email,
                                           @FormParam(value="password")
                                           java.lang.String pass)
        Action function to response to signup request, This function will act as a controller part and it will calls RegistrationService to make registration
        Parameters:
        uname - provided user name
        email - provided user email
        pass - provided user password
        Returns:
        Status string

      • signout

        @POST
@Path(value="/signout")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response signout()
        Action function to response to sign out request. This function will act as a asign out from the login page by giving the object currentuser (name,email ,password)value NULL

      • home

        @POST
@Path(value="/home")
@Produces(value="text/html")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response home(@FormParam(value="uname")
                                                java.lang.String uname,
                                                @FormParam(value="password")
                                                java.lang.String pass)
        Action function to response to login request. This function will act as a controller part, it will calls login service to check user data and get user from datastore
        Parameters:
        uname - provided user name
        pass - provided user password
        Returns:
        Home page view

      • send

        @POST
@Path(value="/send")
@Produces(value="text/html")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response send(@FormParam(value="uname")
                                                java.lang.String uname)
        Action function to response to search9(send) request. This function will act as a controller part, it will calls serach service to check the name we want to search about and get his name from datastore
        Parameters:
        uname - provided user name
        Returns:
        search page view

      • sends

        @POST
@Path(value="/acceptance")
@Produces(value="text/plain")
public java.lang.String sends(@FormParam(value="fname")
                                        java.lang.String fname)
        Action function to response to accept friend request. This function will act as a controller part, it will calls accept service to check the name of the request sender and the accepted check names from datastore
        Parameters:
        uname - provided user name)(login name)
        request - sender name
        Returns:
        fail or accepted yes

      • response

        @POST
@Path(value="/add")
@Produces(value="text/plain")
public java.lang.String response(@FormParam(value="uname")

        Parameters:

        friend - you want to add friend you want to add
        Returns:
        send request success
